description: Before, during or after a day on the water, the R2® TechFace Pants deliver breathable, water-shedding warmth and angler-focused details. The perfect cold-weather/cold-water crosslayer, these tough, versatile pants excel at under-wader insulation or on their own for durable, comfortable warmth. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia R2 TechFace Pants - Mens
